properties.entry: SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_DATE , QNA_VIEW_COUNT , ANS_YN , HERADER_CONTENT , MEM_NAME FROM TB_INQUIRE I JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_HEADER USING (HEADER_NO) WHERE I.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT QNA_NO , QNA_TITLE , QNA_CONTENT , QNA_DATE , ANS_CONTENT , ANS_DATE , ANS_YN , HERADER_CONTENT , MANAGER_NO , MEM_ID FROM TB_INQUIRE I JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) JOIN TB_HEADER USING (HEADER_NO) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_INQUIRE SET MANAGER_NO = ? , ANS_YN = ? , ANS_CONTENT = ? , ANS_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_INQUIRE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE QNA_NO IN ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR(A.TXT, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) TXT FROM ( SELECT ? TXT FROM dual ) A CONNECT BY INSTR(A.TXT, ',', 1, LEVEL-1) > 0 )
